name: Convulsion Shooter
description:
Introduction

A colorful first person shooter game, you use keyboard to move and aim and mouse to navigate various menus. You can't look up or down and need to keep track of various stats during gameplay.

Made for USAGI Game Jam

Story

You wake up surrounded with garbage in a city full of psychopaths and murderers. Last memory you have is being inside of a tube filled with water and echoing voice commanding you to kill. Your body is barely human so you can use your skin shield to withstand damage and eat goblin hearts for stronger muscles!

Controls

W = FORWARDS
S = BACKWARDS
A = TURN LEFT
D = TURN RIGHT
Q = STRAFE LEFT
E = STRAFE RIGHT
SPACE = SHOOT
SHIFT = Run and Turn faster
CTRL = Walk and Turn slower

Learning how to Strafe and Turn at the same time is VITAL for survival!

Ingame you have a menu on your right with everything ranging from touch screen style controls to changing your weapons and keeping track of your various stats such as your bladder.

Credits
